name: Doodle Combat - Army Air Force Planes Battle
name_original: Doodle Combat - Army Air Force Planes Battle
description:
Foghop comes up with the latest Doodle Combat Army planes battle. Are you ready to help Phoenix in this Hawks’ game by shooting the enemy aircraft? If yes, download Doodle Combat now on your Android devices and enjoy destroying the rival pilots in this paper graphics game.

Doodle Combat Plane Game is different from other Sky Fighters’ games. Phoenix, the hero has to fight multiple enemy bosses making this Sky Fight interesting. You will not feel bored as there are the plane, tank and ship boss types to destruct.
Once you progress through the levels, powerups like the magnet, shield and double stars will be unlocked. Superweapons help you in this Shooting Squads’ game, so you can collect more stars.

This Space Force is free for download with in-app purchases. Make the most of this airplane shooter game by installing now!

Game Features:
✔ Mind-blowing shooting game with challenging levels. Save yourself from meteors at all times.
✔ A shoot-em-up with interesting power-ups and super weapons.
✔ Game design is ideal for devices of all types.
✔ Checked paper graphics game is easy on your eyes even after hours of playing.
✔ Dangerous airplane shooter game that keeps you at the edge of your seat!
✔ Enabled with in-app purchases so you can beat your enemies faster.

If you are looking for a brand new Space Force game, download Doodle Combat now on your Android device and enjoy this Doodle Army planes battle!
